intro: Conophytum altum, commonly known as the tall conophytum, is a succulent plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family and is characterized by its compact, fleshy leaves that store water. The plant produces striking yellow or orange flowers during the summer months. It thrives in well-drained soil and requires full sun to partial shade. Due to its unique appearance and adaptability, it is a popular choice for rock gardens and arid landscapes.
